page.title: 20GOOD/BYE FROM TROON 1985.
page.content: We have really enjoyed this project and hope that whoever reads our information finds us interesting. The things we children of 1985 enjoy most are being happy ,being healthy, eating our favourite and listening to our pop music.We look forward to Christmas, our birthdays,and the wonderful moments that make us feel that we are special people. The things we dread are getting into trouble,death,having to wear a brace, coming out in spots, getting lost in a strange place and the worst fear /Nucleur Wars.Our life in Troon is very happy and although the climate is neither too hot or too cold we still enjoy many activities both indoors and out.The happiest times are of course spent with our friends and family. Our final message is a universal one,"BE PEACEFUL IN YOUR WORLD.BE HAPPY IN YOUR LIFE."
